type.title: Transitional provisions.
type.context: CORPORATIONS (PROVISION FOR CONVERSION INTO PUBLIC COMPANIES) ACT under Transitional provisions.4. (1) The Minister may after a corporation has beenincorporated as a public company pursuant to section 3, atthe request of the Directors  of  the  companyor afterconsultation with such Directors,   by   order,   make   suchprovisions,   including provisions relating to the assets ofthe corporation transferred to the public company, asappear to him to be necessary or expedient to facilitate thetransition of the corporation to a public company limited byshares under the Companies Act:Provided that no such order shall be made after theexpiry of two  years  from  the  date  on  which  thecorporation  was registered as a public company.(2)An order made under subsection (1) shall besubject to negative resolution of the National Assembly.
